document_data.mainbody:
rlond Stormserpent was a nobleman of House Stormserpent sometime prior to the late 15 century DR.
A statuette of Arlond Stormserpent was kept in Stormserpent Towers. The statue was known as "Arlond Stormserpent Slaying a Dragon", and was used by Mirt as a projectile against the young Lord Broryn Windstag, after the latter turned on him, alongside Marlin Stormserpent, having released Mirt from an enchanted axe and realized that Mirt wasnt a blueflame ghost that he could command.
